*INSIDE THE ARK*

> <OLD>
>
> "My contribution to the cause" said Perceptor=
 while he started to type
> something in his mini computer that was integra=
ted in his arm. At the same
> time a internal Device started to operate ins=
ide the BlackFortress.

<NEW>

As Perceptor worked on manipulating his proj=
ects at the Black Fortress,
Legacy, Santon and Bump continued to watch over=
 Nightlight, Bump running a
scanner over her and watching her systems caref=
ully.

=93She is still stable, but we need to give her a larger infusion of=
 power.=94
Bump said.

Legacy nodded as he stood, =93Is there not a technit=
ronic defibrillator
located here?=94 His voice was calm and reasoning, his =
single optic pulsing as
it seemed to almost scan the room. His arm was stil=
l being held in the air,
the cannon end of it casting light about on other =
wise pitch dark room.

=93Yes.=94 Santon said quikly. =93YES it is!=94 he s=
aid a little more loudly until
Bump looked up at him and made a shushing mo=
tion with his hand.

Santon looked sheepish and then he also stood and open=
ed a small closet.
Quickly he reached inside the closet and pulled out a de=
vice that roughly
the size of a large suitcase and quickly brought it over =
to Nightlight=92s
bedside.

Bump=92s optics lit up as if he now also realiz=
ed what was going on. The
defibrillator was designed to reregulate a transf=
ormer=92s electronic path
ways by shocking them, and the device may still y=
et hold a little power.

Santon set the machine down and pulled out two sma=
ll paddles and placed them
on either side of Nightlight=92s spark chamber.
=

=93Be sure that it is at its lowest setting, we need for it to low and yet=

continuous.=94 Legacy said quietly as he watched the work. =93If it is too=

strong it can damage her, or run out before her systems turn over.=94

San=
ton nodded as he worked the machine, Bump was standing next to him
assistin=
g.

After a moment Santon looked back at Perceptor, it was as if he only no=
w
remembered that he was still in the room. =93Get ready, this should work,=
 but
we can=92t be sure.=94

Santon stood as he spoke, =93CLEAR!=94 and he =
pressed the activate button.

=93BEEEEEEEEPPPPP=94 The monitor said as Nigh=
tlight flatlined again, and then .
. .

=93BEEP . . . BEEP . . . BEEP=94

N=
ightlight=92s systems began to reboot, her systems beginning to waken and
o=
perate under her own power.




*INSIDE THE BLACK FORTRESS*

> <OLD>
>
> "S=
ecuence of auto destruction started in 3 minutes"said a femenine voice
> in=
side the BlackFortress and in its sorroundings"Minimal safe distance is
10
=
> miles...."
>
> Inside the Black Tower, Rat Trap gets the message, as he g=
ets up, and
scrambles for his > life, as he quickly backtracks the way he g=
ot in.
>
> "I hear ya Rodimus! Ohhhh, time ta haul tail! Hey, by the way, I=
 can't get
through ta Wheels! I think somethn's really wrong with 'em, beca=
use he
usually responds right away ta me!"
>
> Windlord started to move qui=
ckly backwards trying to reach out the exit

<NEW>

The spider-cons that we=
re following Windlord suddenly gave up the chase as
the destruct sequence w=
as set in motion. As the voice started speaking the
tiny bots came to a com=
plete stand still, their multi-opticed heads going
dark as any spark of int=
ellect vanished.

For Rat Trap and Windlord the way towards the exit was ea=
sy enough to find,
all they had to do was to run back in the direction that=
 they had come. It
took only a few moments to reach the opening in the wall=
 that would lead
them to the hallway and the opening that would lead out of=
 the base. The
question was, was Scourge still out there waiting for them? =
So far neither
Rat Trap nor Windlord could hear anything.

*IN THE BATTLE*
=

> <OLD>
>
> Night Shift opens a com link to Noctorro.
>
> "NIGHT SHIFT TA =
NOCTORRO! OVER, WE GOT AN EMERGENCY! TUCSON'S DOWN, I
REPEAT TUCSON'S DOWN!=
"

<NEW>

Nightshift=92s call only got noise and feedback, it would seem th=
at
communications are still down for the Maximals and Autobots.

> <OLD>
>
=
> Talon took off and transformed in her trasmetallic raven form and shoot
>=
 several or her feather missiles against her enemies while she tried to
> a=
proach to Tucson and Kup did the same

<NEW>

As Talon took off into the ai=
r, narrowly avoiding the vicious claw from
Skyshadow, the other fuzors imme=
diately opened fire on him, trying to knock
him from the air. At the same t=
ime Injector, transforming into something
that looked to be a cross between=
 a lionfish and a hornet. His wings buzzing
menecingly as they held him in =
the air. With a strange insectil grin he his
back end directed itself at Ta=
lon, an end that ended with barbed tip stinger
missile. With a slight jerk =
the missle disconnected and launched itself at
Talon!

> <OLD>
>
> Hydras w=
as ready to do a final blow to Tucson when he heard the self
> destruction =
device started, then he moved backwards and open comlink to
> Cyclonus and =
yell "Cyclonus, WHAT IS THAT?!!!!"

<NEW>

=93Sir!=94 Cyclonus=92 voice cam=
e over the radio to Hydras, =93There is some sort of
detonation sequence in=
 progress.=94 There is a pause from Cyclonus, the sounds
of computers can b=
e heard behind him as well as a female voice that was
counting down a two m=
inute warning.

=93Hydras=94 Cyclonus finally came back. =93It was Percepto=
r! I can see his
programming all over this.=94 Cyclonus paused again and th=
en continued, =93I am
trying to stop it, but it looks like that is somethin=
g Perceptor had had
time to plant carefully.=94

Meanwhile as Cyclonus is t=
alking to Hydras . . .

>>THOOM!!<<    >>THOOM!!<<

The sounds of cannon fi=
re can be heard as the large forms of Silverbolt,
Airhammer, Torca, Bantor,=
 and Noctorro the Maximal Fuzors leap up and begin
firing at the Predacons,=
 Noctorro actually firing at Hydras hoping to
distract him so that Tuscon c=
an be pulled to safety!

"Get Tuscon out of there!" Noctorro said, his deep=
 voice booming across the
battlefield. "We are going to have to back up and=
 regroup, there are too
many of them to stand out here in the open!"

AT TH=
E ARK

> <OLD>
>
> Outside the Ark, Uproar and Quickstride continue to stic=
k close to Rodimus
and the others and nodd as they look to each other. Upro=
ar grins.
>
> "Cool, so if the fortress goes bye bye, then we regain the co=
ntrol of the
Ark... Maybe it's better if we wait it out a little bit."
>
> =
Quickstride grins too.
>
> "Yeah, true, if we wait it out, then we got a be=
tter chance at getting in
safely, and effectively.. I like that idea. I'd r=
ather not have ta damage
anything in the Ark... "

<NEW>

The white and bro=
wn armored Leo II nodded as he kept looking back at the
Ark, peering at it =
through the underbrush, as if waiting for some sort of
sign. Ramulus and Wi=
ng Caliber just waited patiently, checking over their
weapons to be sure th=
ey were primed.

=93It won=92t be that easy.=94 Rodimus said. =93The tower =
blowing should distract
whoever is inside, but we still have to get in and =
bring them down.=94

Rodimus turned to look back at Uproar and Quickstide, =
=93I am sure they will
not be happy to see us when we get in there. Be read=
y.=94

Glancing back at the Ark Rodimus keyeed his channel to Perceptor, =
=93So how
long do we have until the base goes up? Was thirty seconds long e=
nough, or
do we need to give you more time? We don=92t want to come in too =
early.=94

(TAG)

Preston

--0014853d202eb47920049b400360
